author: randomvariable
body:
Fixes #2809 

Wrap selection of $moreCommand in Try, Catch block, and default to `cat` where `less` is not found.

In addition, add the less package to the Docker images so it works anyway.

comments.author: randomvariable
comments.body:
I've hesitated on this, because I think my initial solution is wrong, and the suggested fix doesn't resolve it.

Should the `more` function return `cat` even though it's not a pager? I think the correct behaviour is to error if no pager is found.

What needs to be changed is `get-help` doing an [unconditional pipe into `more`](https://github.com/randomvariable/PowerShell/blob/6f3445a48643c8997d637a93606b92d726b7dc65/src/System.Management.Automation/engine/InitialSessionState.cs#L4667).
This would require a try, catch block wouldn't it?

comments.author: lzybkr
comments.body:
I'm on the fence here - `help` reporting an error isn't that helpful - a warning might be better.

If we fall back on `Out-Default`, that will always work. Another option is to fall back on `Out-Host -Paging`, which maybe isn't supported all that well on any platform, or maybe not at all on some hosts, but at least attempts to offer paging.

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: I would prefer `Out-Host -Paging`. It's more elegant. Only the cmdlet requires significant improvement in paging to reach opportunities of `more` or `less`. If we want to make this improvement before 6.0 release, then I definitely would prefer here `Out-Host -Paging`.

comments.author: randomvariable
comments.body: I had a brief look at the more / less code base in BSD, looks like a significant chunk of work to achieve parity in `-Paging`.

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body:
Yes. 😒 
Today, it is absolutely impossible. In may 2016 team did a great job of porting `consolehost`. However, today we still have a lot of open issues with it. It requires a big effort from us to reach the true capabilities of the windows native console.

So now we could leave the `more/less/Out-Default` and open a new issue to migrate to `Out-Host -Paging` after improvements to the coreclr consolehost.

comments.author: mirichmo
comments.body: @randomvariable and @iSazonov - Based on your comments, this appears to be an abandoned PR and I am going to close it. Please let me know if it should be reopened.

title: Default to outputting help via cat
